## api package

<h3>Why does this API exist?</h3>

`@shlack/types` is a api for managing fruit types and type guards for our demo slack app. This is part of Mike's

If you want to watch a recorded video of this course, look for it on <a href="https://frontendmasters.com" target="_blank">FrontEnd Masters</a>

## Remarks
